member.name: T:Waher.Content.Markdown.GraphViz.GraphViz
member.summary: Class managing GraphViz integration into Markdown documents.

member.name: M:Waher.Content.Markdown.GraphViz.GraphViz.#ctor
member.summary: Class managing GraphViz integration into Markdown documents.

member.name: M:Waher.Content.Markdown.GraphViz.GraphViz.Init(System.String)
member.param: Content root folder. If hosting markdown under a web server, this would correspond to the roof folder for the web content.

member.name: M:Waher.Content.Markdown.GraphViz.GraphViz.SetInstallationFolder(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the installation folder of GraphViz.
member.exception: If trying to set the installation folder to a different folder than the one set previously. The folder can only be set once, for security reasons.

member.name: M:Waher.Content.Markdown.GraphViz.GraphViz.SearchForInstallationFolder
member.summary: Searches for the installation folder on the local machine.
member.returns: Installation folder, if found, null otherwise.

member.name: M:Waher.Content.Markdown.GraphViz.GraphViz.Supports(System.String)
member.summary: Checks how well the handler supports multimedia content of a given type.
member.returns: How well the handler supports the content.

member.name: M:Waher.Content.Markdown.GraphViz.GraphViz.Register(Waher.Content.Markdown.MarkdownDocument)
member.summary: Is called on the object when an instance of the element has been created in a document.

member.name: M:Waher.Content.Markdown.GraphViz.GraphViz.GenerateHTML(System.Text.StringBuilder,System.String[],System.String,System.Int32,Waher.Content.Markdown.MarkdownDocument)
member.summary: Generates HTML for the markdown element.
member.returns: If content was rendered. If returning false, the default rendering of the code block will be performed.

member.name: M:Waher.Content.Markdown.GraphViz.GraphViz.GeneratePlainText(System.Text.StringBuilder,System.String[],System.String,System.Int32,Waher.Content.Markdown.MarkdownDocument)
member.summary: Generates Plain Text for the markdown element.
member.returns: If content was rendered. If returning false, the default rendering of the code block will be performed.

member.name: M:Waher.Content.Markdown.GraphViz.GraphViz.GenerateXAML(System.Xml.XmlWriter,Waher.Content.Markdown.Model.TextAlignment,System.String[],System.String,System.Int32,Waher.Content.Markdown.MarkdownDocument)
member.summary: Generates WPF XAML for the markdown element.
member.returns: If content was rendered. If returning false, the default rendering of the code block will be performed.

member.name: M:Waher.Content.Markdown.GraphViz.GraphViz.GenerateXamarinForms(System.Xml.XmlWriter,Waher.Content.Markdown.Model.XamarinRenderingState,System.String[],System.String,System.Int32,Waher.Content.Markdown.MarkdownDocument)
member.summary: Generates Xamarin.Forms XAML for the markdown element.
member.returns: If content was rendered. If returning false, the default rendering of the code block will be performed.

member.name: M:Waher.Content.Markdown.GraphViz.GraphViz.GenerateImage(System.String[],System.String,Waher.Content.Markdown.MarkdownDocument)
member.summary: Generates an image of the contents.
